data.text: @shomaristone @MalcolmNance @Newsweek OMG WTF.?

@shomaristone @Newsweek @MadisonSiriusXM @NancyPelosi @RepMaxineWaters @RealDLHughley @ninaturner @BreakingBrown @BernieSanders @RepGwenMoore @IramiOF @OfficialCBC now this chit have to stop! Black Americans are Citizens and Ancestors built this country leave us the hell alone!!!!!
@shomaristone @DayJreamer @Newsweek I wish when these types of racism result in a 911 call the police come and see the racism which caused the call the caller should be  fired and put on a list

@shomaristone @Newsweek Ving should submit a FOIA request for those calls, obtain caller names, & sue each neighbor-caller! At the “get to know your neighbor” party, the police should have given out warning tickets for false reporting. So the next time, it costs the caller money or a few days in jail!

@perryra1968 @shomaristone @MalcolmNance @Newsweek I teach my kids to always take color out of everything they do because God loves all and so should they! I don’t want my children to limit themselves from happiness by practicing such garbage! lol

@shomaristone @Newsweek Enough is enough do the police put a gun in white folks faces when they go to their homes? It's time to vote every mayor, council person, elected official out of office we pay tax's too
@DonnieReid16 @shomaristone @MalcolmNance @Newsweek It's up to responsible parents to end the cycle and teach their kids equality among all people.  Until then, racism will continue for generations.

@shomaristone @Newsweek I've already tweeted about this several times. White people calling the police on black people doing normal things, like walking around in their own home, is becoming a fad. Hopefully, as a culture, we'll become more socially conscious one day & this won't be an issue #VingRhames

@shomaristone @Newsweek How did the neighbor not know they lived across the street from a movie star? Heck I live in the same city Suzanne Somers grew up in and everybody in town still talks about it.
@shomaristone @Newsweek Thanks for sharing @shomaristone! Praying for our Sons🙏🏽
@shomaristone @Newsweek First the Gimp, now this.
@shomaristone @Newsweek how awful

@shomaristone @Newsweek He is a famous actor. Don’t the cops watch the Mission Impossible movies? 

Seriously, this is getting out of hand.
@shomaristone @MalcolmNance @Newsweek There really should be some accountability to the person who called this in. Disgusting.
@JLambrnos @shomaristone @Newsweek He has the meats so are they going to take them away from him? (Arby's ads)
@old_warrior1 @shomaristone @Newsweek Green doesn't outweigh Black.
@shomaristone @MalcolmNance @Newsweek HAVE TO GO BACK ARRESTING N HEAVILY FINING PPLNWHO REPORT  FALSE CRIMES TO THE POLICE
@shomaristone @Newsweek Can’t even live in your own house. This is America

@shomaristone @MalcolmNance @Newsweek Wtf? He’s one of the most recognizable actors in America. How the hell can this even happen? Shitty as hell that this kind of thing happens almost daily. If some unarmed black man isn’t being shot in the back by cops, they’re being accosted in their own homes. Sad days for sure.
@shomaristone @Newsweek #Neighborsaintsonice #Jealousy #envy #hate. 🐃💩😤😠#Wakeup!  What about #duediligence? #Pigs should have #checked. #Sue them #Ving.
@shomaristone @Newsweek When those in power aren’t willing to share and feel threatened instead of being strengthened by the rise of others’ stature, that’s called racism.

@shomaristone @MalcolmNance @Newsweek “Rhames is currently the star of hit blockbuster movies like "Pulp Fiction" and the "Mission: Impossible" franchise. The latest movie in that series came out earlier this year” **The fucking movie came out YESTERDAY**
@shomaristone @MalcolmNance @Newsweek I'm really happy they didn't kill him.
@shomaristone @MalcolmNance @Newsweek Seriously 😒
@shomaristone @MalcolmNance @Newsweek How do you not know Ving Rhames is living next door?

@shomaristone @Newsweek I’m not sure what to think about this article.  Let’s remove race.. Does he not know his neighbors? Does his neighbors not know him? Points to a bigger question.  Can we as a society live beside someone for years and not know them.  Think about that for second.
@shomaristone @Newsweek disgraceful

@shomaristone @Newsweek And of course the neighbor denies it. So the police go to a residence and don't check while on the way who lives there? With all the technology we have today, that is an easy check.
And then expect a " burglar" to answer the door in basketball shorts??
@shomaristone these kind of stories are getting completely out of hand! Seriously? Didn't anybody recognize him ? He's a well-known actor. 😞
@shomaristone @Newsweek This needs to stop. Ving is not safe even though he is a rich and famous POC. He could have been killed. That neighbor seems to have deliberately targeted him.

@shomaristone @MalcolmNance @Newsweek Sadly racism has been hiding in the closets of some horrible people who are our neighbors for years. Thank God the rest of America hates racism! Remember hatred is taught at the kitchen table!
@shomaristone @MalcolmNance @Newsweek Had time to put up pictures of his family too
@shomaristone @MalcolmNance @Newsweek Simply outrageous.  As outrageous as it was yesterday, it remains so today. This needs to stop!
@shomaristone @Newsweek Be glad whn they start charging for falsifying a police report smh
@shomaristone @Newsweek God invented brownies *literally* so you would make them and bring them to meet your neighbors.

@shomaristone @Newsweek Sick sick shit: neighbors not only didn't know they lived next door to VINg RHAMES, they also didn't even know their neighbor was black. What the fucking fuck?  Turn off fox and go meet your neighbors, racist assholes

@shomaristone @Newsweek This has got to stop! You can't control the color you are born, but the hatred and distrust is bred into children and this needs to stop. Judge individuals by their actions and not by race, age, gender, religion, political affiliation, accents, etc. Melting pot, remember?
@shomaristone @Newsweek That is crazy!😢
@shomaristone @Newsweek So much for neighbors, they don’t even know who lives next door 😢

@shomaristone @MalcolmNance @Newsweek Newsflash to the neighbor that called the police: Ving Rhames is a large black man.  He owns the house next door.  You should apologize to him profusely and publicly.
@shomaristone @MalcolmNance @Newsweek Fuck white America!!
@shomaristone @Newsweek That neighbor has a lot of nerve calling the police, then denying it was him who did it.  I hope he crapped his pants when he opened HIS door. https://t.co/S3Ycpx4CJJ
@shomaristone @Newsweek Burglars answer the door now do they?
@shomaristone @MalcolmNance @Newsweek This is getting ridiculous, but worse, it's downright dangerous for people. For every person, no matter what their heritage is.Wonder if some ass prank called.
@shomaristone @MalcolmNance @Newsweek One word that describe these ppl,  “Inferior “
@shomaristone @MalcolmNance @Newsweek Similar to what happened to Skip Gates.   So disgusting!

@shomaristone @MalcolmNance @Newsweek So neither the cops nor the neighbor knew who Ving Rhames is? That neighbor seriously didnt know who was living next to them? The police actually held him at gunpoint? This is new levels of low for the Brads in the country of What TF is going on...even if he wasn't an iconic star https://t.co/iDPBCsfFzH

@shomaristone @Newsweek It is time to start naming names and showing the faces behind such calls. If it's acceptable now that a black person can quite easily be killed in such circumstances, the instigators should be as readily be named. Otherwise we are getting nowhere.
@shomaristone @Newsweek You mean his own neighbor doesn’t know who he is and that he lives there??
@shomaristone @MalcolmNance @Newsweek Who the fuck are these people?  They should be arrested for falsely calling 911.
@shomaristone @MalcolmNance @Newsweek It’s too bad he couldn’t get all medieval on that shit. https://t.co/ZJO0PICHqr
@shomaristone @MalcolmNance @Newsweek Shitzzzzz......a new low.
@shomaristone @MalcolmNance @Newsweek WTH!
@shomaristone @MalcolmNance @Newsweek So sorry Ving. So wrong on All levels.
@shomaristone @MalcolmNance @Newsweek Pretty sad you don’t recognize your neighbors!
@shomaristone @MalcolmNance @Newsweek Neighbors just realized a big black man lived in this house?
@shomaristone @MalcolmNance @Newsweek What has become of us ??? 😢
@JLambrnos @shomaristone @Newsweek It doesn’t even matter these days.
@shomaristone @MalcolmNance @Newsweek When will this shit stop!
@shomaristone @Newsweek Idiots

@shomaristone @Newsweek It's unfathomable that so many view each of these incidences as unique and not part of a larger pattern when they clearly are a larger issue that needs to be addressed immediately. Worshiping a flag can take a goddamn back seat to equal justice for all.
@shomaristone @Newsweek Disgusting. I’m so embarrassed by our country right now.
@shomaristone @Newsweek Shameful!
@MisstyCotton @shomaristone @Newsweek Or...their freaking neighbor. I mean, WTAF?
@shomaristone @Newsweek I can’t believe this, people are ridiculous!
@shomaristone @Newsweek Retaliation for not getting Mission Impossible Fallout passes
@shomaristone @Newsweek Wow scary
@shomaristone @Newsweek "Living while Black"
@shomaristone @Newsweek Has Ving considered ADT? Just funning.
@shomaristone @Newsweek What in the fresh hell...?
